feature.name: normalDistributed
feature.description: create normal distributed variable

feature.name: exponentialDistributed
feature.description: create poisson distributed variable

feature.name: customDistributed
feature.description: create variable according to a custom distribution

feature.name: uniform
feature.description: create a set uniform distributed to a distribution

feature.name: different
feature.description: create set from different distributed variables (will become normal distributed in the end)

and.name: Extraction
and.description: key values can be extracted from the set

feature.name: mean
feature.description: calculate mean of set

feature.name: standardDerivation
feature.description: calculate the standard derivation of the set

feature.name: median
feature.description: calculate the median of the set

feature.name: variance
feature.description: calculate the variance of the set

feature.name: modalValue
feature.description: calculate the modal value of the set

feature.name: minimum
feature.description: find minimum value

feature.name: maximum
feature.description: find maximum value

feature.name: kurtosis
feature.description: calculate the kurtosis of the set

feature.name: ascending
feature.description: sort in ascending order

feature.name: descending
feature.description: sort in descending order

and.name: Application
and.description: possible featured applications that use statistical framework

feature.name: networkStats
feature.description: create statistic from networkflow or listening to several ports (log ping for example)

feature.name: email
feature.description: analyze all your emails

feature.name: singleDoc
feature.description: analyze a single document

feature.name: loadSet
feature.description: load a set from file

feature.name: saveSet
feature.description: save a set w/wo calculations

feature.name: GUI
feature.description: use a GUI

feature.name: Terminal
feature.description: use the terminal output

feature.name: plot
feature.description: plot your set with interesting values displayed

feature.name: histogram
feature.description: plot a histogram of your set

feature.name: table
feature.description: create table of your set (values vs probability)

feature.name: scatterplot
feature.description: create scatterplot for two variables of your set

feature.name: loadImage
feature.description: load an image (rgb or grayscale values ) as data set

and.name: adHocMode
and.description: terminal adhoc mode (e.g. for server use)

feature.name: readSet
feature.description: read in a set from terminal or get it piped from another program

feature.name: xml
feature.description: be able to load from / save to the xml format

feature.name: json
feature.description: be able to load from / save to the xml format
